channel.title: security on My blog
channel.description: Recent content in security on My blog

item.title: Setup Cloudflare CFSSL with OCSP responder
item.description: CFSSL is both an HTTP based Public Key Infrastructure (PKI) Certificate Authority server, an Online Certificate Status Protocol responder and a PKI toolkit.

item.title: Notes: X.509 Certificates and the Internet-of-Things
item.description: Today most of IoT/M2M applications are using passwords, pre-shared keys or maybe no security for device communications.
